/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. On either side of the street, lush green trees stand tall, their leaves providing a vibrant contrast to the blue sky. The street itself is lined with buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. In the distance, a bridge can be seen, adding another layer of depth to the image. The overall color palette is dominated by shades of green, blue, and gray, creating a calm and peaceful atmosphere.
